title: I won't lie sometimes when someone feeds then tries to surrender

replies.body: The potential double explosion is the only acceptable reason to FF.
I have stolen both of these memes
i only surrender when were about to take the enemy nexus, after game chat comments are totaly worth it if it goes through
You could call people who feed and then start to feed thu _bane_ of my existence.
"   ,   " See that? It's called a comma.
It's funny because when my teammate feeds and goes 0/9/1, they always vote no to surrender. But if they were to vote yes I'd just vote no.
I wont lie, I do the same.

I don't surrender in these kinds of games.
Because i don't acknowledge the fact that they feed their ass off and then want to throw in a towel and end the game faster because it's now convenient for them. No apology, no "sry team, i was having a bad game", "this was honestly my mistake"... Nothing. Not a peep from them.

I would've surrendered if they were being sports and say anything to at least appear to regret how the game turned out but nah. They feed and then they want to leave ASAP. The game is no longer worth the effort they put in. So as a punishment, i play the game till the end, even if it's a known loss. If my time is being wasted, they will have to sleep in the same bed of their own making.

and you fuck 3 other people who did nothing wrong..gj man...you just creating more and more toxicity...

Nobody likes to play a game with a feeder everyone wants to move on...

I get that you try to be funny with you post but think about it....

I've seen plenty of games where one person is feeding and throwing up the surrender vote, but the rest of the team is doing fine.

Besides, it takes 2 to fail a surrender vote, so at most there's 1 person who's feeding and 2 people who want it while 2 people want to tough it out.

I once had a feeding duo with another bandwagon feeder denying surrender votes for 10 minutes (starting at 15) when it was a complete stomp match where everyone on my team was doing badly.

But somehow it was my fault because I had 9 deaths out of our 27 total due to enemy Nunu jungle wrecking me at every turn.

If you get the enemy team fed, at least let them have some fun with their lead, it feels really shitty to try hard, get ahead and the enemy team gives up. 

It's as if every time you're gonna bust a nut, you get abducted by aliens who surgically extra your nut and manually splatter it everywhere. 

No one wants to be abducted by aliens. 

No one.

>It's as if every time you're gonna bust a nut, you get abducted by aliens who surgically extra your nut and manually splatter it everywhere.

What the fuck is this shit?

---
Why would any team allow the enemy team to fuck around with them?
If they won the game, they won the game. I don't care about inflating their egos and scores for their chests and keys while i am losing either way and getting nothing in return. If they want to screw around, bot games exist for a reason. Enemy teams that do end up screwing around and chasing kills instead of finishing the game, give the opposing losing team a real chance at getting back into the game because sooner or later, those champions with bounties will start to die due to overextending. Then they'll gradually start losing the individual leads they had, they'd have trouble contesting objectives and even more trouble grouping together.

This is the number one way on how to throw a game.
You dick around because you think that's fun and then you're the one losing the game.
